## UserInterface.clearTerminal() method

Clear the Terminal window, as if the player ran `clear` in the terminal

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
clearTerminal(): void;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

void

## Remarks

RAM cost: 0.2 GB
